mapper.select: SELECT id as id, assets_name as assetsName, assets_custodian as assetsCustodian, replenishment_before_quantity as replenishmentBeforeQuantity, replenishment_quantity as replenishmentQuantity, replenishment_person as replenishmentPerson, replenishment_storage_location as replenishmentStorageLocation, replenishment_remarks as replenishmentRemarks, create_time as createTime, asset_management_id as assetManagementId FROM oa_asset_replenishment WHERE create_time > #{startTime} AND create_time < #{endTime} AND asset_management_id = #{assetManagementId}
